name: kion-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol server for Kion cloud spend reporting, compliance, and budget management
long_description: A comprehensive Desktop Extension that provides tools for interacting with the Kion API. Features include cloud spend reporting with advanced filtering, organizational unit management, budget operations, compliance monitoring, and financial data analysis. Supports both static configuration and dynamic authentication via scripts.

tools.name: get_spend_report
tools.description: Advanced cloud spend reporting with filtering and aggregation capabilities

tools.name: get_label_key_id
tools.description: Helper tool for label-based filtering operations

tools.name: get_entity_by_id
tools.description: Get entity details by ID and type for organizational units, projects, or accounts

tools.name: many_auto_generated_tools
tools.description: Auto-generated tools for various Kion API operations

server_base_url.title: Kion Server URL
server_base_url.description: The full url of your Kion instance. e.g. https://kion.example.com

bearer_token.title: Bearer Token
bearer_token.description: The bearer token for authenticating with the Kion API. You can generate this in your Kion instance under 'App API Keys' in your user menu (upper right corner) by clicking 'Add +' on the API Keys page.
